Articles.Content:
I like, that sharp, aerodynamic look on my fighter jets *cough, cough* spaceplnes, so it would be nice to see kind of pointy nosecone and an adapter for it, I mean stock ones aren't bsd, but they could be better. And it's kinda stupid, that my every plane hase the same looking cockpit, no matter if it is fighter, or spaceplane or high speed/high altitude one:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Something like that will do the job:

My question is this: Why was the nosecone made in two pieces? There's no advantage of having it in two pieces, and all it does is increase part counts.

And yes, we will need more nosecones when better aerodynamics are introduced. Right now, though I'm willing to live with mod nosecones.

My question is this: Why was the nosecone made in two pieces? There's no advantage of having it in two pieces, and all it does is increase part counts.

One of the science instruments is made to fit on the end of it.
Random Question: How did you do the strikethrough? I've tried and tried but can't seem to figure it out.

I would LOVE more nosecones, for now i've got to do it with this lil' trick (credit to Mareczex333 for the invention)
